issue.error: ValueError: operands could not be broadcast together with shapes (3,) (4,)
issue.cause: Production EP contexts (shape 3) don't match pattern corpus contexts (shape 4)
issue.impact: EP predictions fail, system falls back to heuristics gracefully

issue_analysis.root_cause: Context key mismatch between EPContextBuilder (Session 146) and pattern corpus (Session 143/144)
issue_analysis.fix_required: Align EPContextBuilder output with pattern corpus schema, or pad vectors to same length

recommendations_for_thor: Option 1: Update EPContextBuilder to use same keys as Session 143 patterns
Option 2: Normalize vectors before comparison (already in cosine_similarity but not in distance calc)
Option 3: Add explicit schema validation when loading patterns
The error happens in find_similar_patterns:121 when calculating Euclidean distance
